participant_1.background:
I live with my mother in a small town in the Midwest.
i am an army ranger.
i work part time in the campus library.
My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search.
i currently am engaged to my high school boyfriend.

participant_2.background:
I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun.
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
i volunteer at animal shelters.
i like antiques.
I have been single for a while now and enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
That's good to hear. I'm doing well too, thanks for asking!
Glad to hear it! What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my family and friends, reading, and playing video games.
Those are all great hobbies! I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends, and I love to read and play video games as well.
What kind of games do you like to play?
I enjoy a variety of games, but I mostly play RPGs and action-adventure games.
I love RPGs too! I'm currently playing Skyrim and I'm really enjoying it.
Skyrim is a great game! I've played it a few times and I always enjoy it.
It's so much fun to explore the world and do all the different quests.
Yeah, it's a really immersive game.
Thanks! It's always nice to meet someone else who enjoys the same games I do.
Me too! We should play together sometime.
That would be fun! I'll PM you my gamertag.
